additionalInfo.description: Display text providing more information on the bundle.

additionalInfoUri.description: Link to a web page with more information on the bundle criteria and benefits.

productIds.description: Array of product IDs for products included in the bundle that are available via the product endpoints. Note that this array is not intended to represent a comprehensive model of the products included in the bundle and some products available for the bundle may not be available via the product reference endpoints.
